scripts.go-build-win: rm bin/bedrock_win; cd cmd; go build . ; mv cmd ../bin/bedrock_win; cd ..
scripts.go-build-mac: rm bin/bedrock_mac; cd cmd; go build . ; mv cmd ../bin/bedrock_mac; cd ..
scripts.go-build-linux: rm bin/bedrock_linux; cd cmd; go build . ; mv cmd ../bin/bedrock_linux; cd ..
scripts.go-example-container-vagrant-vars: export BEDROCK_VAGRANT_IP=192.168.33.11; export BEDROCK_VAGRANT_PUBLIC_IP=192.168.2.100; export BEDROCK_VAGRANT_PROJECT_PATH=$(pwd)/test/example_container; export BEDROCK_VAGRANT_BEDROCK_PATH=$(pwd)
scripts.go-example-test-build-times-mac-go: SECONDS=0; npm run go-example-build-mac prod; echo "[example-mac-go] $SECONDS secs" >> log/times.log
scripts.go-example-test-build-times-mac-node: SECONDS=0; pushd test/example/node_build_comparison; npm run build prod; popd; echo "[example-mac-node] $SECONDS secs" >> log/times.log
scripts.go-example-test-build-times-mac: echo "[example-mac] Start time test"; for i in {1..3}; do npm run go-example-test-build-times-mac-go; npm run go-example-test-build-times-mac-node; done; echo "[example-mac] Time test ended"
